__e: - Hans Christian, I'll call you back.
Hans Christian, is there anything else I should know?
As long as Hans Christian wasn't caught telling a blatant lie ...
I plan to take Hans' hands and do the first hand transplant [shouting] out of a cave!
Listen, Hans, what say we talk about this on the drive home?
Finally, I couldn't take it anymore. I ditched Hans and left him at the club.
